title: 2016 Singapore Cup
text:
The 2016 Singapore Cup (also known as the <a href="RHB%20Bank">RHB</a> Singapore Cup for sponsorship reasons) is the 19th edition of Singapore's annual premier club <a href="Association%20football">football</a> tournament organised by the <a href="Football%20Association%20of%20Singapore">Football Association of Singapore</a>. <a href="Albirex%20Niigata%20Singapore%20FC">Albirex Niigata (S)</a> are the defending champions, having won their first trophy the previous year. The final was won by Albirex Niigata (S) 2-0. <a href="Tampines%20Rovers%20FC">Tampines Rovers</a> striker <a href="Billy%20Mehmet">Billy Mehmet</a> received the man of the match award.
Teams.
A total of 12 teams participate in the 2016 Singapore Cup. 9 of the teams are from domestic <a href="2016%20S.League">S.League</a> while the other three are invited from <a href="Cambodian%20League">Cambodia</a> and <a href="United%20Football%20League%20%28Philippines%29">the Philippines</a>.
Format.
Eight teams were drawn for the preliminary round while the other four seeded teams received a <a href="bye%20%28sports%29">bye</a> for that round. The eight teams will play against one another in a single-legged knockout basis. Winners of this round will progress and advance to the <a href="2016%20Singapore%20Cup%23Quarter-finals">quarter-finals</a>. Thereafter, matches are played in <a href="Two-legged%20tie">two legs</a> with the exception of the one-match final.
For any match in the knockout stage, a draw after 90 minutes of regulation time is followed by two 15 minute periods of <a href="Overtime%20%28association%20football%29">extra time</a> to determine a winner. If the teams are still tied, a <a href="Penalty%20shoot-out%20%28association%20football%29">penalty shoot-out</a> is held to determine a winner.
Preliminary round.
The draw for the preliminary round was held on 24 April 2016 at <a href="Connaught%20Drive">Connaught Drive</a>. Eight teams involved in this round will play in a single leg knockout basis. The matches will be played from 26 to 29 May 2016. Winners of this round will progress and advance to the <a href="2016%20Singapore%20Cup%23Quarter-finals">quarter-finals</a>.
Quarter-finals.
Four teams (<a href="Home%20United%20FC">Home United</a>, <a href="Geylang%20International%20FC">Geylang International</a>, <a href="Global%20FC">Global</a> and <a href="Ceres-La%20Salle%20F.C.">Ceres-La Salle</a>) will join the four seeded teams in this round after winning their matches in the Preliminary Round. All matches will be played in a two-legged knockout basis. Away goal rule will not be applied in this tournament. Winners of this round will progress and advance to the <a href="2016%20Singapore%20Cup%23Semi-finals">semi-finals</a>.
Matches.
"Balestier Khalsa won 4–3 on aggregate."
"Albirex Niigata (S) won 4–2 on aggregate."
"Tampines Rovers won 5–2 on aggregate."
"Ceres-La Salle won 5–3 on aggregate."
Semi-finals.
Matches.
"Albirex Niigata (S) won 2-0 on aggregate."
"Tampines Rovers won 5-3 on aggregate."
